North_Charleston.Cabbage Row: Cabbage Row is a set of pre-Revolutionary buildings at 83 and 85 Church Street in Charleston, South Carolina. The buildings are most notable for having been the inspiration for "Catfish Row" in the DuBose Heyward novel Porgy and later the opera Porgy and Bess by Gershwin. DuBose Heyward had lived nearby on Church Street.
